term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - protective action in colloid chemistry
term.title: protective action

item.text: Addition of small amounts of hydrophiliccolloid to a hydrophobic sol may make the latter more sensitive to flocculation by electrolyte. Higher concentrations of the same hydrophiliccolloid usually protect the hydrophobic sol from flocculation. This phenomenon is called protective action.
